item.title: Shawn Mendes,Camila Cabello - Senorita
item.description:

call me senorita
I wish I could pretend
I didn’t need ya
But every touch is
woo la la la

la la la

coming for ya

in Miami

from summer rain

off me

her name la la la

moonlight

for ya for ya for ya

item.title: Shawn Mendes - 305
item.description:
It’s
305
I’m on
a roller coaster ride
Hoping you don’t
change your mind
I don’t wanna
let go
Never been so sure
in my life
You’re my sunlight
on a rainy day
Would
take my heart
With you
if you walked away
I’m a mess right now
I’m a wreck right now
I’m waiting
for the moment
That
you let me down
If you cut
the cord
I don’t know
what I’d do
Don’t wanna skydive
without my parachute
I’m a mess right now
baby help me out
I’m scared
I’m gonna wake up
And
you’ll let me down
This feeling doesn’t
fade no matter
How hard
that I try
I always think
about it
At the same time
every night
It’s
305
I’m on
a roller coaster ride
Hoping you don’t
change your mind
I don’t wanna
let go
Never been so sure
in my life
I’m
terrified
You’ll turn around
and say goodbye
Hoping you don’t
change your mind
I don’t wanna
let go
I’ve never been
so sure in my life
If there’s a door
to heaven
Baby
you’re the key
And if I had to beg
I’d be on my knees

I wanna wake up

never been so sure
